text: Walmart Canada's commitment to accessibility & affordability in healthcare is a step in the right direction. As a fervent supporter of centrum rechtse values, I believe in balancing individual freedom with collective responsibility. It's important to ensure that everyone has access to quality healthcare, while also recognizing the role of pharmacists in diagnosing & prescribing minor ailments. This approach can help alleviate pressure on the primary care system and promote efficient use of resources. Kudos to Walmart Canada for leading the way!"
